exercises.name: Barbell Back Squat
exercises.instructions: 1. Place barbell across upper back, just below the traps. 2. Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, toes slightly outward. 3. Lower your hips as if sitting in a chair, keeping your back straight and chest up. 4. Push through your heels to return to the starting position.
safety_tips: Use a spotter, especially with heavy weights
Maintain proper form throughout the movement
exercises.tips: Focus on controlled movements and proper breathing

exercises.name: Dumbbell Bench Press
exercises.instructions: 1. Lie on a bench with feet flat on the floor. 2. Hold dumbbells above your chest, palms facing each other. 3. Lower the dumbbells slowly to your chest, keeping your elbows slightly bent. 4. Push the dumbbells back up to the starting position.
common_mistakes: Bouncing the dumbbells off the chest
modifications: Performing the exercise on an incline
safety_tips: Use a spotter, especially with heavier weights
Control the weight throughout the movement
exercises.tips: Squeeze your chest at the top of the movement

exercises.name: Cable Rows
exercises.instructions: 1. Attach a V-bar or rope handle to a low cable pulley. 2. Bend at the hips, keeping your back straight. 3. Pull the handle towards your abdomen, squeezing your shoulder blades together. 4. Slowly return to the starting position.
safety_tips: Maintain a straight back throughout the movement
exercises.tips: Focus on controlled movements and a full range of motion
